Eligible patient follow : histologically cytologically confirm NSCLC , undergone EGFR-TKI retreatment sometime failure initial EGFR-TKI . After initial treatment , patient treat chemotherapy subsequently re-treated EGFR-TKI identified . The target population derive multicentre Taiwan . The study aim evaluate clinical effect re-administration EGFR-TKI use retrospectively collect data eligible patient provide valuable information .
